entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
